item.description:
Please join us 6 pm Monday, November 14th

Boston Biotech Meetup Group

MassBio Conference Room

Free Beer and Snacks

We are pleased to have a guest in town,

Gaspar Taroncher-Oldenburg, PhD, Nature Publishing Group

Gaspar is the Co-chair, Program Committee of the 2012 BIO International Convention, to be held here in Boston, June 18-21th. He will be in town finalizing the education program for the event.  Come hear Gaspar's insights into the topics and trends from the more than 600 session submissions.

Gaspar, serves as Executive Editor of SciBX for NPG, was previously a scientific editor of Nature Biotechnology for five years. He holds a Ph.D. from MIT and the Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution and a first degree in biology from the Universidad Autónoma in Madrid. Prior to joining Nature Biotechnology, Gaspar conducted research and taught at Princeton University, MIT and Tufts University.

Questions?  Contact Margaret Core  mcore@bio.org
item.how_to_find_us: The door to the MassBio is under construction so look for the covered area....9th floor
item.name: November Monthly meetup- Guest Speaker Editor from Nature Publishing Group
